settings.title: Announcement: Suspension of online orders
settings.content:
In light of the widespread impact of COVID-19 and the UK government's guidance, we will temporarily stop accepting orders from March 24.

If you have any questions or would like to cancel your order, please contact us at:

info@shiro-shiro.uk

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
